card.name: M Ampharos-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Exavolt
attacks.text: You may do 50 more damage and leave your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed. If you do, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.
